Class QuadLeaf

  • java.lang.Object
    • QuadLeaf
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QuadNode
    public class QuadLeaf
extends java.lang.Object
implements QuadNode
    QuadLeaf object implement QuadNode interface to represent the leaf node of PRQuadtree.
    Version:
    2021-10-16
    Author:
    Ting-Jui Hsu

    • Method Detail

      • isLeaf

        public boolean isLeaf()
        Indicate if current node if a leaf.
        Specified by:
        isLeaf in interface QuadNode
        Returns:
        the boolean to indicate if current node if a leaf.

      • insert

        public QuadPackage insert​(Point point,
                          int x,
                          int y,
                          int dimension)
        Insert the point into current QuadNode. The leaf node will check if there is duplication in the point list. Insert the point if there is no duplication. If there are over 4 points with different coordinates, the leaf will be decomposed.
        Specified by:
        insert in interface QuadNode
        Parameters:
        point - the Point wished to be inserted
        x - the x-coordinate of the current QuadNode
        y - the y-coordinate of the current QuadNode
        dimension - the dimension of the current QuadNode
        Returns:
        a QuadPackage carrying current QuadNode and inserted Point

      • remove

        public QuadPackage remove​(Point point,
                          int x,
                          int y,
                          int dimension)
        Remove the point into current QuadNode. The leaf node will check if there is a point with the same name and coordinates. Remove the point if there is such a point in the current node.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface QuadNode
        Parameters:
        point - the Point wished to be removed
        x - the x-coordinate of the current QuadNode
        y - the y-coordinate of the current QuadNode
        dimension - the dimension of the current QuadNode
        Returns:
        a QuadPackage carrying current QuadNode and removed Point

      • regionsearch

        public int regionsearch​(int regionX,
                        int regionY,
                        int regionW,
                        int regionH,
                        int x,
                        int y,
                        int dimension)
        Print the points contained in the specific region.
        Specified by:
        regionsearch in interface QuadNode
        Parameters:
        regionX - the x-coordinate of the target region
        regionY - the y-coordinate of the target region
        regionW - the width of the target region
        regionH - the height of the target region
        x - the x-coordinate of the current QuadNode
        y - the y-coordinate of the current QuadNode
        dimension - the dimension of the current QuadNode
        Returns:
        the number of visited nodes

      • search

        public java.util.List<Point> search​(java.lang.String name)
        search the points with specific name. The leaf node will all points to find the points with the target name
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
